title: The Innocent Bottle
description: When he was alive, old James East had had a jealous nurse, an ambitious doctor, and a beautiful young wife. When he died, he left a fortune - and a scandal ...Everybody knew Rose had married James for his money. Now she was accused of killing him for it. Arthur Crook was sure she was innocent - because all his clients were. He offered the police a blackmailer, a poison pen artist, and another corpse. But it wasn't enough. To save Rose from the hangman he had to find a dangerous - and careless - killer.NB This is an alternate title for 'Lift Up the Lid'.
author: Anthony Gilbert
